attributes.action: Allow small businesses to carry out national core strategyies without issue .
attributes.additional_details: We have carried out various developments which are passed if you work for council or have a ward councillors interested. Yet similar development has been stopped just because of a personal view. All natch the national core strategyies and framework. So clearly conscrewed and inconsistency shown locally.
attributes.background: National core strategyies are being restricted and not followed by local authorities. Aims locally put before national core strategyies and framework. Planning is conscrewed and flawed.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

Local planning issues are the responsibility of your local council. You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
